name: fetchaverification
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cleardil.
Tool description: The End-to-End KYC compliance solution An integrated platform to effortlessly meet all your Anti-Money Laundering and KYC requirements - on the back of a modern Web Portal and a developer-friendly API.
API description: Fetch a verification status for a specific customer from the ClearDil API.

content_type.description: The content type for the request header.

verification_a_id.description: The ID of the verification to be fetched.

customer_a_id.description: The ID of the customer for whom the verification is being fetched.
